channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Even Trump’s Allies Admit That A Guilty Verdict Would Hurt Him
item.description: Former Trump deputy press secretary Hogan Gidley said that a guilty verdict would change the minds of some voters.

item.title: Tunisia Cracks Down on Africans Migrants: Outsourcing Border Security
item.description: Tunisia is fighting a battle with illegal immigrants from other parts of Africa trying to use the country as a launch pad towards their ultimate destination, Europe. The North African country is close to the Italian coast and even closer to Italy’s smaller outlying islands. To read the rest of the article click here The post Tunisia Cracks Down on Africans Migrants: Outsourcing Border Security appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Robert De Niro Takes Down Trump Supporter Who Called 1/6 Police Traitors
item.description: Actor Robert De Niro took down a Trump supporter after he called 1/6 police officers Michael Fanone and Harry Dunn traitors.

item.title: Britain’s Migrant Boat Headache
item.description: Britain continues to see waves of boats landing on its coast carrying illegal immigrants. The sight of dinghies being towed to shore and migrant men disembarking has become a regular sight. To read the rest of the article click here The post Britain’s Migrant Boat Headache appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Ominous Sign For Trump As Jury Is Locked In On Prosecution During Closing Argument
item.description: The jury is described as attentive and locked into what prosecutors say during the closing arguments of the Trump trial.

item.title: Your City Doesn’t Have a Migrant Crisis Yet? Just Ask Denver for its New How-To Guide.
item.description: Denver city officials have just released a 22-page guide that comprehensively details how to house, feed, clothe, employ, and otherwise subsidize and reward illegal immigration. To read the rest of the article click here The post Your City Doesn’t Have a Migrant Crisis Yet? Just Ask Denver for its New How-To Guide. appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Robert De Niro Shows Up At The Courthouse And Destroys Trump
item.description: Robert DeNiro showed up via the Biden campaign outside the courthouse to call Trump a money grubber, clown, and coward who, if he returns to the White House, won't leave.

item.title: Dutch Migration Crisis and the New Government’s Proposed Solutions
item.description: Like virtually every other Western nation, the Netherlands faces a mass migration crisis. As a result, last November saw Geert Wilders’ anti-mass-migration Party for Freedom (PVV) secure the most seats in the Dutch parliament. To read the rest of the article click here The post Dutch Migration Crisis and the New Government’s Proposed Solutions appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Aileen Cannon May Get The Boot After Rejecting Trump Gag Order Request
item.description: Aileen Cannon became the first judge in a Trump case to reject a gag order request, and her ruling could result in her being booted off the classified documents case.

item.title: House Committee Holds Arizona Field Hearing on Biden Border Crisis
item.description: The House Judiciary Committee recently held a field hearing to examine the effects of the border crisis in Arizona. The hearing, titled “The Biden Border Crisis: Arizona Perspectives,” focused on testimony from law enforcement and Arizona residents. To read the rest of the article click here The post House Committee Holds Arizona Field Hearing on Biden Border Crisis appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
